question: You should spend about 20 minutes on this task.You have a full-time job and you are also doing a part-time evening course.You now find that you cannot continue the course.Write a letter to your teachers. In your letterdescribe the situationexplain why you cannot continue at this timesay what action you would like to takeYou do NOT need to write any addresses
text: I am writing to inform you that I cannot attend  the computer course from next Friday and no way to continue this until it finishes. From the first week of this , the month I joined  a full-time job at a reputed company as an administrator and my new working roster will crash my studying hours from the 25th of July 2022. So, I decided to end up this from that day.

Moreover, before this full-time job I worked as a casual employee and now they offered me a full-time option to work at the same employer. I think this is a valuable chance for me to gain  work experience as a professional worker. I heard the good news that the same one will be going to start a new batch which will be conducted on the weekends after 3 months. So, I think it will be better for me by considering these circumstances.
